title: didn't know me
lyrics:
Geuliwohamyeonseodo miwohaess-eo neol
Gyeolgug-e nan eomma ap-eseokkajido
Nunmul-eul boigo mam apeuge hago
Geuge bulhyoji mwo
Daeche neon wae nalaneun salam-ui
Sal man hadeon salm-e deul-eowa bulhaenghage

Mandeul-eo beolin geonji nan mudgo sipgo

Geu daedab-eul kkog deudgo sipdago

Mos doen naui wonmangppun-ideon

Munja-e mollae apaya haessdeon

Ne mam-eul ijeya al geos gat-a



Naega deo nappa deo nappa

Neoboda nappa deo nappa

Nega deo apa deo apass-eulgeol

Ije wa nan al-a

Geuleon neol almyeonseo

Nega nae gyeot-eul tteonagassdan iyulo

Neol apeuge haess-eo



Naneun neoege salang-gwa us-eumman-eul

Jwossdeon geos gat-eunde ileon apeum naneun

Wonhaji anhneunde neoneun wae na-ege

Jugo tteo nangeonde

Maeil doenoeeo nappeun nom-iya neon

Na eobs-i neoneun gwaenchanh-eun geonyan geu mal-e

Nunmul-eun wae heullin geonji mudgo sip-eo

Tteonago sipji anh-a boyeossdago

Na jom an-adallago

Eogji buligo butjabgo uldeon

Nal bodeon ne mam-eun eottaess-eulkka



Naega deo nappa deo nappa

Neoboda nappa deo nappa

Nega deo apa deo apass-eulgeol

Ije wa nan al-a

Geuleon neol almyeonseo

Nega nae gyeot-eul tteonagassdan iyulo

Neol apeuge haess-eo



Nae milaeleul wihaeseola haessdeon

Geu mal-eul ije da ihaehaessgo

Neoga eobsneun jiog gatdeon geu sigandeul

Ileohge jal gyeondyeonaess-euni

Na jal haessdago

Ije naleul an-ajumyeon

Dasi wa jumyeon an doelkka



Naega deo nappa deo nappa

Neoboda nappa deo nappa

Nega deo apa deo apass-eulgeol

Ije wa nan al-a

Geuleon neol almyeonseo

Nega nae gyeot-eul tteonagassdan iyulo

Neol apeuge haess-eo
